alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 02 at 8:04PM PST until December 03 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 26 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Mountains, North Bay Interior Valleys and Eastern Santa Clara Hills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
